topic: Completion of Degree Credits and Thesis Registration
question: I have 86 ECTS now and am taking a course for 5 ECTS this semester, which would give me 91 ECTS. Is this enough to continue my degree? Additionally, how should I calculate my credits for thesis registration in January?"
answer: You need at least 90 ECTS by the end of this semester to continue your degree. The credits for your thesis count only after completion, so ensure you meet the minimum requirement before registering.
